text: Malcolm Watson Dixon (1934 â€“ 9 April 2020) was an English actor. He was best known as Strutter in the 1981 movie Time Bandits. His height was 4'1" and because of it he often played Ewoks and dwarfs. Dixon worked in Jim Henson's Creature Shop. He also played an Oompa Loompa in Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory (1971). Dixon was born in Crook, County Durham. Dixon died on 9 April 2020 at the age of 66.Malcolm Dixon, Leektar the Ewok in Return of the Jedi, Has Passed Away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from County Durham
title: Malcolm Dixon (actor)
